passives.name: Indomitable (3/Day)
passives.description: The warlord can reroll a saving throw it fails. It must use the new roll.

passives.name: Survivor
passives.description: The warlord regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it has fewer than half its hit points but at least 1 hit point.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The warlord makes two Greatsword or Shortbow attacks.

actions.name: Greatsword
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) slashing damage.

actions.name: Shortbow
actions.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

legendaryActions.description: The warlord can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature’s turn. The warlord regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendaryActions.name: Command Ally
legendaryActions.description: The warlord targets one ally it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see or hear the warlord, the target can make one weapon attack as a reaction and gains advantage on the attack roll.

legendaryActions.name: Weapon Attack
legendaryActions.description: The warlord makes one Greatsword or Shortbow attack.

legendaryActions.name: Frighten Foe (Costs 2 Actions)
legendaryActions.description: The warlord targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see or hear it, the target must succeed on a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened of the warlord until the end of warlord’s next turn.
